spec.name: Sraghna Square
spec.description: Sraghna Square (Place Sraghna) is a public square in a residential or commercial district of Casablanca. Squares like this function as essential local gathering spots, providing open space, seating, and a nucleus for neighborhood life and commerce. The name may refer to a region of Morocco (Beni Mellal-Kh√©nifra) or a local figure.
